---
title: Events
---

WOMBAT (Workshop Organised by the Monash Business Analytics Team) 2024 will be Oct 22-23, Monash offices at 750 Collins St. The theme will be "Opening Doors with Open Source", and key noted by [Michael Lawrence](https://github.com/lawremi). HOLD THE DATES! More details [here](https://numbats.github.io/WOMBAT2024/). This will be in association with OceanR Hackathon held Oct 21, same location, organised by the Statistical Society of Australia Statistical Computing and Graphics Section. 

We hold regular seminars during the semester period (March-June, August-Nov). And there are numerous other events organised or related to NUMBAT.

You can add the events to your calendar via [iCal](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/t0umouvaoo3h62kcfcj7vcfck8%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics) or [Google calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar?cid=dDB1bW91dmFvbzNoNjJrY2Zjajd2Y2ZjazhAZ3JvdXAuY2FsZW5kYXIuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbQ).
